name: The Land I Live On
description:
The theme of the LD46 is Keep it Alive.

You were just born and you hear a plea of help. Aparently you are on the back of a giant turtle and only you can aid it in this time of need. Grab your water gun and say “I will help you! This is The Land I Live On!”.

“The Land I Live On” is a chill 3rd Person Shooter where you need to shoot seeds and withering plants to help them grow and keep the turtle alive.
